summary.span: 表示 的參數，並選擇性地表示其對於 的對應。

span.span: Represents a parameter to an and optionally its mapping to a .

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數名稱不區分大小寫。Parameter names are not case-sensitive. 查詢時使用 Microsoft OLE DB Provider for Oracle (MSDAORA) 和 ODBC.NET Framework 資料提供者的 Oracle 資料庫，使用`LIKE`子句來查詢在固定長度欄位的值可能不會傳回所有預期的相符項目。When querying an Oracle database using the Microsoft OLE DB Provider for Oracle (MSDAORA) and the ODBC.NET Framework Data Provider, using the `LIKE` clause to query values in fixed-length fields may not return all expected matches. 原因是，當 Oracle 比對中的固定長度欄位`LIKE`子句，它會比對整個字串的長度，包括任何填補的後端空格。The reason is that when Oracle matches values for fixed-length fields in a `LIKE` clause, it matches the entire length of the string, including any padding trailing spaces. 比方說，如果資料表在 Oracle 資料庫包含名為"Field1"定義為欄位`char(3)`，並輸入值"a"，資料表中，下列程式碼中的資料列不會傳回資料列。For example, if a table in an Oracle database contains a field named "Field1" that is defined as `char(3)`, and you enter the value "a" into a row of that table, the following code will not return the row. ```vb Dim queryString As String = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?" Dim command As OleDbCommand = New OleDbCommand(queryString, connection) command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a" Dim reader As OleDbDataReader = command.ExecuteReader() ``` ```csharp string queryString = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?"; OleDbCommand command = new OleDbCommand(queryString, connection); command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a"; OleDbDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); ``` 這是因為 Oracle 儲存的資料行值為"a"(填補"a"，與後端空格，3 的固定的欄位長度)，其中 Oracle 不會將為"a"的參數值相符的情況`LIKE`比較的固定長度欄位。This is because Oracle stores the column value as "a " (padding "a", with trailing spaces, to the fixed field length of 3), which Oracle does not treat as a match for the parameter value of "a" in the case of a `LIKE` comparison of fixed-length fields. 若要解決此問題，請附加百分比 （"%"） 萬用字元參數值 (`"a%"`)，或使用 SQL`=`比較改。To resolve this problem, append a percentage ("%") wildcard character to the parameter value (`"a%"`), or use an SQL `=` comparison instead. ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個執行個體經由內。The following example creates multiple instances of through the within the . 這些參數用來從資料庫選取的資料，並將放在資料。These parameters are used to select data from the database and place the data in the . 這個範例假設和已經建立使用適當的結構描述、 命令和連線。This example assumes that a and an have already been created by using the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleParameter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleParameter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定中`value`參數會從 Microsoft.NET Framework 型別推斷。When you specify an in the `value` parameter, the is inferred from the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the . 當您使用的這個多載時請特別小心建構函式。Use caution when you are using this overload of the constructor. 因為此多載會採用`value`型別的，您必須將轉換的整數值時輸入的值為零，如下列的 Microsoft Visual C# 範例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following Microsoft Visual C# example demonstrates. ``` Parameter = new OracleParameter("pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` 如果您不會執行這項轉換，編譯器會假設您嘗試呼叫`OracleParameter`(`string`， `OracleType`) 建構函式多載。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume that you are trying to call the `OracleParameter`(`string`, `OracleType`) constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和連結。The and are linked. 因此，設定變更支援。Therefore, setting the changes the to a supporting . ， ，並能夠推斷參數的屬性，請設定。The , , and properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting . 因此，您不需要加以指定。Therefore, you are not required to specify them. 不過，不會公開在屬性設定。However, they are not exposed in property settings. 例如，如果已推斷出參數的大小，陳述式執行之後未包含推斷的值。For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, does not contain inferred value after statement execution. 針對`String`資料類型的預設值是。For `String` data types the default is . 如需支援的資料類型的清單，請參閱適當成員。For a list of the supported data types, see the appropriate member. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行命令時，包含參數值、 程式碼可以明確地設定參數的型別或參數可以推斷其類型，從它的值。When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value. 呼叫這個方法，以便推斷其類型參數中傳遞的值時，一次，會重設的參數。Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter. 呼叫這個方法會影響兩者並的屬性。Calling this method affects both the and properties of the .

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 預設值為 0 (當您不想指定值的最大大小時可以使用)。

span.span: The default value is 0 (to be used when you do not want to specify the maximum size of the value).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定會影響參數的輸入的值。Setting affects only the input value of a parameter. 傳回值和輸出參數不會影響這個屬性。Return values and output parameters are not affected by this property. 屬性適用於二進位檔和字串型別。The property is used for binary and string types. 針對非字串資料類型和 ANSI 字串資料，屬性參考的位元組數目。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. Unicode 字串資料，指的是字元數。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字串的計數不包含結束的字元。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 可變長度資料類型，說明資料傳輸到伺服器的最大數量。For variable-length data types, describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如，對於 Unicode 字串值，可用來限制傳送給伺服器，以第一次 100 個字元的資料量。For example, for a Unicode string value, could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 針對雙向和輸出參數和傳回值，您必須設定大小的值。For bidirectional and output parameters, and return values, you must set the value of Size. 這是不必要的輸入參數，以及如果未明確設定的值推斷而來從指定的參數的實際大小執行參數化陳述式。This is not required for input parameters, and if not explicitly set, the value of is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter when a parameterized statement is executed. ， ，並能夠推斷參數的屬性，請設定。The , , and properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting . 因此，您不需要加以指定。Therefore, you are not required to specify them. 不過，不會公開在屬性設定。However, they are not exposed in property settings. 例如，如果已推斷出參數的大小，陳述式執行之後未包含推斷的值。For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, does not contain inferred value after statement execution. 對於固定長度資料類型的值會被忽略。For fixed length data types, the value of is ignored. 它可以擷取僅供參考之用，並且會傳回的位元組的提供者會使用傳輸伺服器參數的值時的最大數量。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOracleParameter() Dim parameter As New OracleParameter("pDescription", OracleType.VarChar) parameter.IsNullable = True parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output parameter.Size = 88 End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOracleParameter() { OracleParameter parameter = new OracleParameter("pDescription", OracleType.VarChar); parameter.IsNullable = true; parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; parameter.Size = 88; } ```

summary.span: 設定或取得值，這個值表示來源資料行是否可為 Null。

span.span: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: 這可讓 正確產生可為 Null 的資料行的 Update 陳述式。

span.span: This allows to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果來源資料行可為 null否則， 。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用正確處理可為 null 的資料行時，產生更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 一般而言，使用限制為繼承自的開發人員。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用這個屬性來判斷來源資料行是否可為 null，並將此屬性設定為`true`它是否可為 null，和`false`如果不是。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 當是要產生其 Update 陳述式，它會檢查每個參數。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果屬性是`true`，產生 WHERE 子句，如下所示 （在這個查詢運算式中，"FieldName"代表欄位的名稱）：If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果為 false，欄位為會產生下列 WHERE 子句：If for the field is false, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 颾魤 ㄛ@IsNull_FieldName包含 1，如果來源欄位中包含 null，而 0 則。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 這項機制是用來在 Oracle 伺服器的效能最佳化，並提供適用於多個提供者的通用程式碼。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in Oracle Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

summary.span: 取得或設定參數的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An object that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入參數的值繫結至傳送到伺服器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 輸出和傳回值參數，此值設定完成和已關閉。For output and return-value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 輸入參數，如可以設定為 Microsoft.NET Framework 資料型別或 Oracle 資料類型的物件 (例如或)。For an input parameter, can be set to an object of either a Microsoft .NET Framework data type or an Oracle data type (for example, an or ). 當您將 null 參數值傳送至伺服器時，您必須指定 DBNull，不是 null。When you send a null parameter value to the server, you must specify DBNull, not null. 系統中的 null 值會是空的物件沒有值。A null value in the system is an empty object that has no value. DBNull 用來代表 null 值。DBNull is used to represent null values. 如果應用程式指定的資料庫型別，繫結的值會轉換成該類型，提供者將資料傳送到伺服器時。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供者會嘗試將值的任何類型的轉換，如果它支援介面。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的型別不相容的值，可能會導致轉換錯誤。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. ， ，和參數的屬性可以設定的值推斷而來。The , , and properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting Value. 因此，您不需要加以指定。Therefore, you are not required to specify them. 不過，不會公開在屬性設定。However, they are not exposed in property settings. 比方說，如果已推斷出參數的大小，大小不會包含推斷的值之後的陳述式執行。For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, Size does not contain inferred value after statement execution. `InputOutput`， `Output`，並`ReturnValue` Value 屬性使用值將是 Microsoft.NET Framework 資料型別，，除非輸入的值是 Oracle 資料類型 (例如或)。The `InputOutput`, `Output`, and `ReturnValue` values used by the Value property will be Microsoft .NET Framework data types, unless the input value was an Oracle data type (for example, or ). 這不會套用至 REF CURSOR，BFILE 或 LOB 資料類型。This does not apply to REF CURSOR, BFILE, or LOB data types. 屬性會覆寫**更新**方法。The property is overwritten by the **Update** method.
